description: XcodeBuildMCP provides tools for Xcode project management, simulator management, and app utilities.

INCREMENTAL_BUILDS_ENABLED.description: Enable experimental xcodemake incremental builds (true/false or 1/0).

XCODEBUILDMCP_DYNAMIC_TOOLS.description: Enable AI-powered dynamic tool discovery to load only relevant workflows.

XCODEBUILDMCP_ENABLED_WORKFLOWS.description: Comma-separated list of workflows to load in Static Mode (e.g., 'simulator,device,project-discovery').

XCODEBUILDMCP_DEBUG.description: Enable verbose debug logging from the server.
